snippet: The group said the extension was meant to let the Pakistani government show its intent on carrying peace talks forward.
abstract: Pakistani Taliban says they are extending a cease-fire after the release of a group of prisoners by the Pakistani government.
lead_paragraph: The group said the extension was meant to let the Pakistani government show its intent on carrying peace talks forward.

headline.main: Pakistani Taliban Extend Cease-Fire After Government Releases Prisoners
headline.print_headline: Pakistani Taliban Extend Cease-Fire After Government Releases Prisoners
